wiki.content: The If You Could See Me Now Songfacts explains that this song finds The Script addressing the death of vocalist Danny O'Donoghue's father and both of Mark Sheehan's parents. O'Donoghue's late father Shay, also a musician, died unexpectedly of a stomach aneurysm shortly after The Script formed in 2008, four months after Sheehan lost his mother. Sheehan's dad passed away when he was aged just 14. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The If You Could See Me Now Songfacts explains that this song finds The Script addressing the death of vocalist Danny O'Donoghue's father and both of Mark Sheehan's parents. O'Donoghue's late father Shay, also a musician, died unexpectedly of a stomach aneurysm shortly after The Script formed in 2008, four months after Sheehan lost his mother. Sheehan's dad passed away when he was aged just 14.

track.name: If You Could See Me Now
